pullrequest.title: Fixed documentation, added key modifiers to KeyEvent

content.raw:
I will do it.

I think this will have to be an integration test, because `KeyEvent` is just a wrapper for an event and `GLWidget` is intercepting and filling the actual keypresses. Furthermore, most other applications receive the keypresses through `gui::KeyEventHandler`. Any advice on writing integration tests?

Or maybe this can be a part of a new unit test for `GLWidget`? @nkoenig has a GLWidget_TEST started in [PR 1318](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1318/publish-model-selection). Hmm...
content.html:
I will do it.

I think this will have to be an integration test, because KeyEvent is just a wrapper for an event and GLWidget is intercepting and filling the actual keypresses. Furthermore, most other applications receive the keypresses through gui::KeyEventHandler. Any advice on writing integration tests?

Or maybe this can be a part of a new unit test for GLWidget? @nkoenig has a GLWidget_TEST started in PR 1318. Hmm...
